Abilities.Name: Hustle
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Physical Attack damage by 50% but lowers Accuracy by 20%.

Moves.Name: Present
Moves.Description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

Moves.Name: Ice Punch
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

Moves.Name: Swift
Moves.Description: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Quick Attack
Moves.Description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Moves.Name: Drill Peck
